variables.required:
Conditional. If you specify
                     SourceSecurityGroupName, do not specify
                     CidrIp.
variables.name: CidrIp

variables.required: Yes, for ICMP and any protocol that uses ports.
variables.name: FromPort

variables.required:
Conditional. You must specify the GroupName
                  property or the GroupId property. For security groups that
                  are in a VPC, you must use the GroupId property. For example,
                     EC2-VPC
                  accounts must use the GroupId property.
variables.name: GroupId

variables.required:
Conditional. You must specify the GroupName
                  property or the GroupId property. For security groups that
                  are in a VPC, you must use the GroupId property. For example,
                     EC2-VPC
                  accounts must use the GroupId property.
variables.name: GroupName

variables.required:
Conditional. If you specify CidrIp, do not
                  specify SourceSecurityGroupId.
variables.name: SourceSecurityGroupId

variables.required:
Conditional. If you specify CidrIp, do not
                  specify SourceSecurityGroupName.
variables.name: SourceSecurityGroupName

variables.required:
Conditional. If you specify
                     SourceSecurityGroupName and that security group is owned
                  by a different account than the account creating the stack, you must specify the
                     SourceSecurityGroupOwnerId; otherwise, this property is
                  optional.
variables.name: SourceSecurityGroupOwnerId

variables.required: Yes, for ICMP and any protocol that uses ports.
variables.name: ToPort
